## Vector.cross() function

Compute the cross product of two 3-dimensional vectors.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross\_product](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross_product)

**Signature:**

```typescript
function cross(v: Vector, u: Vector): Vector;
```
